languages.text: "Борюсь с несовершенствами в толковании Лекс Империалис". {n}Соломон на мгновение отводит взгляд от Йегер, всматриваясь в вас.{/n} "Не думал, что вы расцените ситуацию иначе".
"Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."
languages.original_text: "Борюсь с несовершенствами в толковании Лекс Империалис". {n}Соломон на мгновение отводит взгляд от Йегер, всматриваясь в вас.{/n} "Не думал, что вы расцените ситуацию иначе".

traits.locale_text: "Struggling against a flawed interpretation of Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment, looking at you intently{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

"Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

languages.text: «Rechazar una interpretación incorrecta de la Lex Imperialis». {n}Solomorne le quita los ojos de encima a Yeager por un instante para dedicarte una mirada intensa.{/n} «No pensé que pudiera interpretarlo de otra forma».
languages.original_text: "Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

traits.locale_text: «Rechazar una interpretación incorrecta de la Lex Imperialis». {n}Solomorne le quita los ojos de encima a Yeager por un instante para dedicarte una mirada intensa.{/n} «No pensé que pudiera interpretarlo de otra forma».

languages.text: “我在反对对帝国律法的错误解读。”{n}索罗蒙将视线从耶格尔身上移开了一段时间，专注地看着你。{/n}“相信你也是这么认为的。”
languages.original_text: "Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

traits.locale_text: “我在反对对帝国律法的错误解读。”{n}索罗蒙将视线从耶格尔身上移开了一段时间，专注地看着你。{/n}“相信你也是这么认为的。”

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアの誤った解釈に対して戦っています」{n}ソロモーンは、イェーガーからちらりと目をそらし、熱心にあなたを見る。{/n}「他に方法があるとでも考えているとは思っていませんでした」
languages.original_text: "Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアの誤った解釈に対して戦っています」{n}ソロモーンは、イェーガーからちらりと目をそらし、熱心にあなたを見る。{/n}「他に方法があるとでも考えているとは思っていませんでした」

languages.text: « Je lutte contre une interprétation erronée de la Lex Imperialis, {n}rétorque Solomorne en détournant le regard de Yeager pour vous observer attentivement.{/n} J'avais cru comprendre que nous étions sur la même longueur d'onde, vous et moi. »
languages.original_text: "Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

traits.locale_text: « Je lutte contre une interprétation erronée de la Lex Imperialis, {n}rétorque Solomorne en détournant le regard de Yeager pour vous observer attentivement.{/n} J'avais cru comprendre que nous étions sur la même longueur d'onde, vous et moi. »

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis'in hatalı yorumlanmasına karşı mücadele veriyorum." {n}Solomorne, bir anlığına gözlerini Yeager'dan ayırıp dikkatle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Başka türlüsüne ihtimal vermemiştim."
languages.original_text: "Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

traits.locale_text: "Lex İmperialis'in hatalı yorumlanmasına karşı mücadele veriyorum." {n}Solomorne, bir anlığına gözlerini Yeager'dan ayırıp dikkatle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Başka türlüsüne ihtimal vermemiştim."

languages.text: "Ich kämpfe gegen eine falsche Interpretation des Lex Imperia." {n}Solomorne wenden seinen Blick kurz von Yeager ab und mustert dich.{/n} "Ich hatte nicht angenommen, dass Ihr es anders seht."
languages.original_text: "Fighting against a flawed interpretation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne takes his eyes off Yeager for a moment and looks at you intently.{/n} "I did not think you would see it any other way."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kämpfe gegen eine falsche Interpretation des Lex Imperia." {n}Solomorne wenden seinen Blick kurz von Yeager ab und mustert dich.{/n} "Ich hatte nicht angenommen, dass Ihr es anders seht."
